text: Allahale kunai vyaktiko chatibhitra du'i mutu bana'eko chaina ra na usale timra patniharula'i jasala'i timile ama bhanihalchau, timro samccai'ama banayo, ra usale timile mukhale bhaneko choraharula'i vastavika choraharu bana'ena. Yi timra mukhaka kuraharu hun, kintu allahale samco kura bhandacha ra usaile sojho marga dekha'umcha
